 2024-08612024-07-05PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE FRANÇOIS ROLLAND, O.C., of Sutton, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a federal member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective August 5, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of the HONOURABLE FRANÇOIS ROLLAND, O.C., of Sutton, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a federal member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective August 5, 2024.
